_header: Shroud him not ne make him not too bare
_description: Blank verse lines, written as verse, at end of prose English text on Rosemary — four lines

PierpontB21.Transcription:
Schrede hym not ne make hym not to bareOf heys branches but as it is
                    seydAnd if þu noryche hym þus thow schalt haueRose mary in
                    plente & gret help & comfort þerby
